name: Mastercam X8 Model
summary: An MCX-8 file is a 3D model created by Mastercam X8, a computer-aided design ( CAD ) and computer-aided manufacturing (CAM) application. It is a representation of a mechanical part, which machinists use to produce a physical copy of that part. You can open MCX-8 files in Mastercam. From within Mastercam, you can convert MCX-8 files to .IGS or .SPT files, for use in other CAD and CAM applications.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
